website_summaries.verdict: This stunning 1,000-piece set recreates epic battle scenes from the blockbuster “Infinity War” saga.
pros: Build a three-story New York City building that houses the secret sanctum
Protect the Infinity Stone from evil-doers with Dr
cons: Pre-teens may need adult help with assembly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Lego crazy person
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a Lego crazy person, kept my kid off electronics and busy for several hours.. has some features he enjoyed
customer_reviews.author: Value For dollars Spent  Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you hav to buy just ONE Lego Infinitywar series, This is ONE
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my son, he didnt have the patience to out it together, he only wanted to play with it....but I had fun putting it together and it only took about 2-3 hours to do. The set has trap doors, levers, and interactive pieces to make the set more fun to play with....my 5 year old son loves this set
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Set for 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Great price for how big this set feels. My son had fun with the build and we both loved how the final model turned out. He especially liked the hidden panels and breakaway walls and rope/web feature. He asked me to keep it in our display case when not being played with so that it won’t get “messed up”. That means it’s a keeper...for now at least. Also some nice minifigs. Really great set highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Novacaine

customer_reviews.title: Fun build!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic build. Was so fun to put together and super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Germanny

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!There are so many places to act out scenes from the movie and attach your favorite characters all around Dr. Strange's place. Our 10 year old hasn't out this away since receiving it in June for his birthday. Lots of imaginitive play going on here!
customer_reviews.author: 9kids

customer_reviews.title: Sons favorite set in a while
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. My son who has gotten many LEGO sets recently enjoyed this one the most. It has a lot of detail and also enjoyable after putting together. He’s 9 and needed a little help here and there but that’s normal for him with the bigger sets. Only bad thing is it’s a couple dollars cheaper now but it was still on sale when I purchased it and it was cheaper than any other merchant.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: MY SON LOVES IT! GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my son because he loves legos. He could not stope building it. The set is overall amazing and fun to play with. I recommend it to any child who loves LEGOs.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and no replacement
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces. Disappointing for a child to get 1/2 way through and find a whole bag of pieces 1/8 missing. There were in its place 2 of 1 step. Biggestest disappointment was that amazon couldn’t send just the missing pieces and are making us repurchase which means spending $40more now that the price has gone up. Son spent a lot of time putting it together. Make sure you check all pieces are there before investing too much time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica  R Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Super cool set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew this Christmas. He’s a lego freak like I was, but with way cooler options than I had. He has SO many lego sets and I was afraid that this one would be cheap and fail to live up to his expectations. This is actually one of the coolest sets because of it’s characters and moving parts. He was very happy so I’m happy. I recommend this set for any person that loves legos and Marvel.
customer_reviews.author: ForcedEuphoria

customer_reviews.title: Late birthday gift- with a little disappointment
customer_reviews.text: As with all lego sets, this order came with high anticipation from my son, he was thrilled to open the box and went right to assembling. Unfortunately there was a missing piece- an important character's face! Luckily he has other sets and was able to replace, but he was very disappointed. I've never experienced that with lego before- so I'm really hoping he lost it somehow- but we searched all over and nowhere to be found. Otherwise, he is thrilled and we are looking forward to the next set to get him.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie O

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is SO detailed and amazing! All of the stickers are amazing and fun, and the insides are amazing! Spider-Man's apartment is very cool and the same goes to Dr. Strange's Sanctum Sanctorum, with all of its little pieces and unique pieces. there are great characters, and i still have this set intact (WOW) and I use it and the characters very often! This build takes maybe 3-4 hours for someone who gets Legos, but is not an expert yet, but the time is worth it! I still remember sitting around the table with my brother and friend building this set!
customer_reviews.author: C DeBlaay

customer_reviews.title: Avengers Assemble... this set.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastically fun set that looks great with Avengers sets or other LEGO buildings. It’s not complex to build, but not too easy either. The figurines are a lot of fun and there is so much character in each... character. I decided to put up some lights and I’m loving it. Great display piece!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Spiderman and Marvel fans
customer_reviews.text: Our Marvel obsessed 9 year old LOVED this set. It's difficult enough to keep them busy for an afternoon, and has some great little touches that any Spiderman or Marvel fan will appreciate. Bought it when it was 20% off but we would have paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: K Ming

customer_reviews.title: The Best Value for the Money with the Coolest Characters
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit so much that I bought 4! Whenever they go on sale. I love the figures but I love the parts and architectural components more. I usually sell the extra mini figures and keep the bricks. GET THIS BEFORE THE PRICES GO THROUGH THE ROOF!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan R. Kovatis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lego set of the Sanctum!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, fun build. Good selection of characters. Got mine on a super sale - but they didn't tell me it had a large hole in the box on the front! The set was for me, and all the pieces were there, so I didn't mind. Lots of play features built into this set. Recommended set for any age Marvel fan!
customer_reviews.author: J.A. McCullougH

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My children and I built this together, and we’ve played with it several times since. It’s the perfect addition to our other LEGOs, but is certainly enough to stand on its own, so no other sets needed.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Find!!!!
customer_reviews.text: More than pleased with this item it truly fills a little boy's dreams, this was the biggest part to add to a similar smaller version of the similar named item. Thank You So So Much A+++++++ seller
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great set, not great price
customer_reviews.text: This set is huge. My pre teen loves it. Cant give it 5 stars because legos are so dang expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Makes Stuff

customer_reviews.title: underrated set
customer_reviews.text: Its a good set with some interesting pieces (and a lot of them). Didn't do great in retail; the box art was confusing and didn't 'tell the story well.' I picked it up for about $60, which was a steal for this licensed set and number of elements.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Dresbach

customer_reviews.title: Great challenge for a 9yr old
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was crazy about this set and couldn't wait to show me all the cool features. The level of detail was amazing and the creative design kept him absorbed for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandsons 10th birthday. He has been building LEGO’s since he was 4. He has a room full of finished logo buildings . He was really excited to get this one. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: coffee snob

customer_reviews.title: Super cute set...keeps 'em busy for hours
customer_reviews.text: What. An I say, it's Legos. Always a quality product. It's not often that a company gives you extra pieces like Lego does either. Super cute set. My 6 year old spent all week end playing with it and building it.
customer_reviews.author: Megalicious

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: One of the best marvel sets I have. Great minifigs and an awesome build. Super fun, not too easy but not overly difficult. Must have for any marvel lego fan. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Deraco

customer_reviews.title: more please!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an 8 yr old. He was so excited. Had it completed in about 2 days. He is wanting more!! More in this series please!
customer_reviews.author: ShopN4Me12

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew who is 6 but he is a little young for this prop duct tote about to put it together on his own. But if he had an adult helping him he can do it and feels a sense of pride he he has finished or accomplished a section
customer_reviews.author: donna ferrera

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! My son gets these sets done quickly and this one took him a little longer and was more challenging. It’s such a great finished product that he’s kept it out put together for months just to play with!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Big Set

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the only way to get the Time Stone
customer_reviews.text: Legos are awesome. Probably wouldn't have bought this set, but needed to complete the Infinity Gauntlet.

customer_reviews.title: Large set, blends well with Creator Expert series sets.
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great way to add a Marvel presence to a simple Lego City. Everything included is great building material with nothing goofy, just good bricks.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron West

customer_reviews.title: Sanctum Santorum
customer_reviews.text: Great build. Love all the "destructible" walls that pop out. I do wish they wouldnt have included iron man since he is in the guardians ship set and replaced him with Wong or Bruce Banner.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing architecture and great play features
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, kids loved building it and using the exploding windows. They also like the feature where a figure can get knocked off the parapet and catch their fall on the rope.

customer_reviews.title: Lego's always great

customer_reviews.text: Great price, and my 7 year old loved it! Like a boy's doll house but for lego characters and super heroes. He loved it, and I loved the charm of it all.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected

He had it completed in about 2 hours. For younger kids I would recommend having a parent near by since some of the parts are small & could easily be misplaced.

product_meta.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes Avengers: Infinity War Sanctum Sanctorum Showdown 76108 Building Kit (1004 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Stage a LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 76108 Sanctum Sanctorum showdown between Iron Spider-Man, Iron Man and doctor strange and the super villains. This all-action Super hero toy features a foldable, 3-level new York city building including Doctor strange Sanctum Sanctorum, with an exploding wall function and hidden Infinity stone element, plus a Pizzeria and Peter Parker apartment, both with exploding window functions. The rooftop has a minifigure-launch function and a water tower with minifigure-winch function for iron Spider-Man. This buildable set also includes a detachable street corner scene, plus 4 mini figures and a big figure with weapons and 20 power Burst elements.
feature_bullets: Build a 3-level New York City building including the Sanctum Sanctorum with an Infinity Stone, pizzeria with fire extinguisher, Peter Parker’s apartment, window exploder functions and water tower
This fun toy includes includes 5 Infinity War figures: an Iron Spider-Man figure, Iron Man figure, Doctor Strange figure and Ebony Maw figure, plus a big Cull Obsidian figure
Sanctum Sanctorum measures over 11-inch (30cm) high, 7-inch (20cm) wide and 8-inch (21cm) deep
Recreate thrilling scenes from the Marvel Super Heroes Avengers: Infinity War movie with this action-packed builders’ toy
1004 pieces - Avengers: Infinity War movie toy for boys and girls aged 8-14 LEGO Marvel Super Heroes playsets are compatible with all LEGO building sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,004 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
